_meta.description: Venue Reduced Record — 20 core fields for high-level filtering and bride-facing comparison.

short_description: An exceptional Provençal estate on the edge of the Luberon Park near Forcalquier, offering exclusive privatisation for weddings of up to 150 guests with 40 sleeping on-site across 6 independent cottages, set within a 4-hectare award-winning landscaped park.
